title: Sürgavere
text:
Sürgavere () is a village in <a href="P%C3%B5hja-Sakala%20Parish">Põhja-Sakala Parish</a>, <a href="Viljandi%20County">Viljandi County</a> in central <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a>. It has a population of 398 (as of 2009).
It has a station on the <a href="Tallinn">Tallinn</a> - <a href="Viljandi">Viljandi</a> railway line operated by <a href="Elron%20%28rail%20transit%29">Elron</a>.
